topic.title: I created a new blog platform written from scratch using Vue.js and Bulma
topic.body:
Key features:
- Mobile friendly
- Endless newsfeed (no pages) with dynamic post appending when the page bottom has been reached
- Editable posts and comments
- Post editor supports uploading of images, videos and audio files
- Filtering by last comments and most liked posts by day, week, month, year or all the time
- Direct links to posts are available (click on the post date to get it)
- Vertical wrapping of long posts
- Easily clonable
- Site title and description configurable via content.json file (or via the sidebar)

Feel free to clone: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1J2ZJjs97wEcW36x5d9f1QnPVPVDv8wbJ/

1510499714_18j1DomS5vDgXcKnSGuSmPSDTQjxi.body:

All done. Please, check: http://127.0.0.1:43110/173jgCe7oqQQAG8V4dNEDyHY4mFFWJKF1Q

> [gitcenter](#comment_23_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Yes, it works now. Thanks! BTW, I suggest you to change link to http://127.0.0.1:43110/173jgCe7oqQQAG8V4dNEDyHY4mFFWJKF1Q, so that site is downloaded by ZeroNet before opening.

Done.
